title: Billion Dollar Sugar Baby
description: Bachelor. Billionaire. Unlucky in love. Alex Schaffer is tired of rich playboys with ulterior motives.Broke. Tired. Trying to get by. Wren Collins just wants to look after his found family.Wren's life is about to go from rags to riches when Alex decides he wants Wren all to himself, and he's willing to pay any price.It was supposed to be a simple transaction, but what if they went and complicated it by doing something crazy ... like falling in love?
author: E.M. Denning
